plot: In a post tsunami Sri Lanka affected by war, reconstruction is a difficult task for all. Driven by the love and strength of their children, people find their reason to continue to struggle for a better future.
title: Ants and Elephants
plot_es: In a post tsunami Sri Lanka affected by war, reconstruction is a difficult task for all. Driven by the love and strength of their children, people find their reason to continue to struggle for a better future.
